name: Amish Friendship Chocolate Bread
author: KATHY422
summary: This is a great variation to the traditional Amish Friendship Bread.  My family says it's like eating chocolate cake. This bread freezes well and makes a great gift.
ingredients: 1 (5.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease two 9x5 inch loaf pans
In a large mixing bowl, stir together all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, chocolate pudding
Make a well in the center of this mixture
Add Amish friendship bread starter, vegetable oil, milk, eggs and vanilla extract; mix well
Pour batter into prepared loaf pans
Bake in preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean, about 60 minutes
Cool on a wire rack for 10 minutes before removing from pan
